summary.body: I've been quoted almost 100 by Cadogan Tate to take a sofa (not a huge one) from Nine Elms Lane to the Barbican. Seems a lot and I can carry one end of it, so does anyone know a good Man with a Van they can recommend?
summary.subject: Man with Van - anyone know one?

summary.body: ... a man (or two) with a van? And a good locksmith for the Barbican? Thanks!
summary.subject: Can anybody recommend ...

summary.body: I'm moving my stuff out of the barbican to clapham junction. Can anyone recommend a man with a van to help me?
summary.subject: Man with a van

summary.body: We're trying to find someone who could pick-up a sofa (3-seater) on Commercial Rd and deliver it to the Barbican next Tuesday (19th). Any suggestions anyone? Many thanks
summary.subject: Man with van
